my-github (opens new window)
  • React学习部分开始
  • 1、手写React.createElement ReactDOM.render
  • Index.js
import React from './source/createElement.js';
import ReactDOM from './source/react-dom';



// jsx编译成React.createElement是在webpack中执行的
let element = <h1 className={'aaa'} style={{color:'red'}}>hello world</h1>
// React.createElement("h1", null, "hello world");


// element就是vnode
console.log(element);
console.log(JSON.stringify(element,null,2));

//不可变 也不可增加属性
// element.type = "div"

// 将虚拟dom转换真实dom
ReactDOM.render(element,document.getElementById('app'))
